spell.name: Starstone Pebble
entries: You create one glowing dart of magical force. That dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals {@damage 1d4 + 1} force damage to its target.

The spell creates more than one dart when you reach higher levels: two at 5th level, three at 11th level, and four at 17th level. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Starstone Arc
entries: You fire a horizontal arc of magic that spreads outward. Each creature in a 25-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d4} force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Starstone Barrage

components.m: one marble or pebble per projectile

entries: You fire three magic shooting stars that pursue a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each star. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional star for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blade of the Last Dahlia

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You conjure a glittering rapier of sapphire energy and make a melee spell attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage and and then becomes sheathed in arcane energy until the start of your next turn. If the target casts a spell before then, the target takes {@damage 1d10} slashing damage, and the spell ends.

This spell's damage increases when you reach certain levels. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).

spell.name: Dahlian Slicer
entries: You conjure a magic sword and deliver a swift slash. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the creature takes 2d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier slashing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can make an additional attack for every 2 slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Dahlian Retaliation

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a spell from a creature within 120 feet of you that you can see

entries: As a reaction to being damaged by a spell, you can quickly gesture and attempt to redirect some of the incoming magic.

You reduce the damage (if any) of the spell by 1d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, and can retaliate with summoned blades by making up to two ranged spell attacks against any creature within 30 feet of you. The blades deal 1d6 + your spellcasting modifier slashing damage on a hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage reduced increases by 1d10 for every 2 slot levels above 2nd and you can make summon one additional blade to make a counter attack.

spell.name: Dahlian Greatbow
entries: You summon a magic greatbow and fire a conjured arrow at a creature or object within 600 feet. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the target is more than 150 feet away, the attack roll has disadvantage. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} piercing damage.
If you use the ready action to cast this spell, the attack roll has advantage and it deals an additional {@damage 2d6} damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage and the damage increase for using the ready action both increase by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Starstone Barrage
entries: You fire a barrage of starstone shards from the spells focus in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line takes {@damage 5d4} force damage.

On subsequent turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to continue firing. When you continue firing, you can choose to change the direction of the line. If you move or take another action, the spell ends.

components.m: a straight focus [eg. a wand, steel rod, or baton]

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rock Sling
entries: You create three masses of dirt, stone, or loose debris from a surface within 5 feet of you and send them flying in a straight line 10 feet wide.

Beginning with the closest object or creature in the line, make a ranged spell attack for each of three masses. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage and one mass is destroyed. On a miss, you repeat the process for the next closest object or creature. The masses fall apart with no effect after travelling 60 feet.
If a single creature is hit by two of the masses, that creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional mass for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Night Shard
entries: Fire a semi-transparent magic bolt at a creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. If you or the target are in dim-light or darkness, make this roll with advantage. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} force damage.

components.m: a shard of starstone and a mirror

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ambush Shard
entries: Launch a small projectile and immediately teleport it so that it strikes the target from an unexpected direction. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the spell deals {@damage 3d8} force damage. This spell ignores any bonus to AC granted by a shield or a dexterity modifier. The target also gains no benefit from cover.
Additionally, if you cast this spell within 5 feet of your target you have advantage on the attack instead of disadvantage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Spear
entries: You summon a spear made of lightning and hurl it at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} lightning damage.

When you cast this spell, you can choose to release the magic just before the start of your next turn instead, charging the lightning spear and increasing the damage by {@dice 1d6} and the range by 60 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
